author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Adjusted image handling to look for images relative to the converted document.
- Set dummy handling for blockquotes and varlists.
# Those need to be handled correctly later.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Fixed issue #15380: iconv notice in Zend_Search_Lucene backend.
- Fixed issue #15381: Another iconv notice in Zend_Search_Lucene backend.
- Fixed issue #15382: Zend_Search_Lucene->deleteById did not really remove the
entry because Zend_Search_Lucene wouldn't find the item by just the ID.

author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Improved test coverage of getConstructor() and getTags()

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Fixed issue #15625: RSS 0.90 feeds are parsed as RSS 1.0 feeds.
